id: [Resources for Artists] Folder Icon Set for Windows/Notion - Nord Palette
name: [Resources for Artists] Folder Icon Set for Windows/Notion - Nord Palette
description: Hello!If you want to have your Notion dashboard or Windows folders organized accordingly with the NORD palette, well, you're in luck!These folders are meant to be used on Windows or anything you like, really. It's a great way to organize your folders with some color and keep everything very tidy. There is a small comparison from before and after the customization in both light and dark mode on the banner, so you can see how it looks like on Windows!This is a Free Resource! It is not meant for Co
features: (18) Icons in both .ICO and .PNG formats, 448x320px; A ReadMe file containing instructions and important information (Please read!)
